file_content.text: [The droid appears to be shut down.]
[The droid appears to be shut down.]
[The droid appears to be shut down.]
Protocol failure. Cannot complete mission. Cannot complete shipment delivery, Oradam village. Protocol failure.
Are you the droid with the supply shipment?
You Gizmel's droid?
I have the supplies. They are safe.
What was your mission, droid?
Mission?
I have been entrusted with the delivery of spice to one Gizmel Gam, Ord Mantell government.
What happened?
Delivery failed due to protocol failure. Coordinates to destination unreadable. Attacked by species savrip, a hulking beast. Movement failure.
However, shipment is intact. Item: contraband drug known only as "spice." Origin: Kessel. Destination: Gizmel Gam, Ord Mantell.
What does Gizmel Gam want with spice?
Why spice?
The shipment is filed under "village relief."
That guy was receiving spice? That's illegal!
Spice is evil.
I do not know about sentient laws. I know my mission.
No, I'm not looking for spice. I'm looking for supplies.
No, it's supplies.
This is the only shipment in my databanks. One container of spice, filed under "village relief."
The mission must be completed. Will you take the shipment to Gizmel Gam?
Yes, I will take the shipment to Gizmel.
I'll do it.
Good. Mission complete. Shutdown in--five, four, three, two, one.
No, the mission has changed. Destroy the shipment.
No. Destroy it.
I must obey.
Mission complete. Shipment destroyed. Commence shutdown. Five, four, three, two, one.
Protocol failure. Cannot complete mission. Cause: movement failure.
